relation: Have support for "repeatX" in the projection classes
Help Menu polishing / Support page inclusion
Extended library API (no MarbleWidget dependency for tasks like parsing, routing)
Marble Touch on Android (including SOK branch merge)
Support for loading geolocated photos (e.g. in a Gallery activity in Marble Touch)
Layer Management (by the user: Toggle layer visibility; maybe move layers from legend and layers in menus to one central place/tab)
Zoom to content of geo file after loading (at least on start-up)
Improve project handling: load/save dialogs, add project journal.
Support TGF (trivial graph format) documents for import/export.
Support core features for DOT/Graphvis documents for import/export.
Main Window UI Reorganization: Editor Toolbar, dialogs, Information Panel
Configuration Dialog Optimizations: Code-Editor, Graph Editor
Data Structure Backend wise iconsets and preconfigurations for types
Printing and image export of graphs.
Visual Graph Editor Handling: copy&paste, data structure focus, property display
Smart resizing of training screen with aligned vertical lines
Prominent hint during training if the user makes repeatedly errors
Show course descriptions in course selector
Show a message when keyboard layout visualization isn't available due missing data
Splitted the QML Components from KAlgebraMobile
New plotting plasmoid graphs, in QtQuick
